content: Kwik Bolt 3 Wedge anchor SS316 High-performance wedge anchor with everyday approvals for uncracked concrete (316 stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Approved by ICC-ES for concrete Rounded end for easy installation Dog point impact section to prevent thread damage during installation Testing according to AC193 results in smallest edge distance and spacing for all wedge anchors in class Also available in carbon steel, hot-dip galvanized and 304 SS Applications Fastening structural steel Attaching exterior hand rails and signs Fastening curtain wall and masonry facade Fastening exterior seating and bleachers Glazing ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 316 Head configuration: Externally threaded Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Nuclear (NQA-1) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 316 | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Nuclear (NQA-1) | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer, SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 282569 -
